subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A clause in Nashville’s 30-year arena lease states that unless ticket sales average 14,000 a game this season, the Predators will be at liberty to relocate after the 2007-8 season.
snippet: A clause in Nashville’s 30-year arena lease states that unless ticket sales average 14,000 a game this season, the Predators will be at liberty to relocate after the 2007-8 season.
